item.description:
Do you wish you could buy a good, affordable sailboat to enjoy the freedom of sailing a boat of your own?

The April meeting of the Boston Sailing Meetup is pleased to offer the informative seminar "How to Buy a Used Sailboat" on Thursday, April 10th at 6pm at the Community Boating Boathouse on the Charles River. The presentation will be given by Jack Wasson of Advantage Yacht Sales, who has spent the last 10 years finding the right boats for clients.

The presentation will cover:
-- Determining your needs
-- How to find the right boat
-- Making an offer
-- Getting an in-depth survey
-- Avoiding the traps
-- Negotiating a good deal
-- Closing the deal

If you hope to purchase a used boat of your own someday, this seminar will provide you with an overview of the process so you can be an educated consumer. There will, of course, also be time to talk sailing and our plans for sailing this summer. Please join us!

Directions to the Boathouse (by car and T) can be found here: http://www.community-...
item.name: The Boston Sailing April Meeting
